text: was a Japanese animation studio based in Kokubunji, Tokyo, founded by former Tatsunoko Production animators on May 1, 1995. ==Works== ===Television series=== ===1990s=== *Sorcerer Hunters (TV Tokyo) (October, 1995 – March, 1996) *Bakusō Kyōdai Let's & Go!!
